thread.title: Kanye West Reportedly Rescinds Trump Support, Deletes All Trump Tweets
thread.title_full: Kanye West Reportedly Rescinds Trump Support, Deletes All Trump Tweets

author: audreyabrowning@utexas.edu (Audrey Browning)
title: Kanye West Reportedly Rescinds Trump Support, Deletes All Trump Tweets

persons.name: kanye west/twitter kanye west/twitter the trump

text:
Photo via C-SPAN/YouTube BTW 
Kanye West may have met with Donald Trump and shown the president public support , but Trump's recent actions have shaken their relationship. 
West has deleted all mentions of Trump from his Twitter account and is reportedly now anti-Trump, according to TMZ sources . In December, the two reportedly discussed issues of importance to West, such as “bullying, supporting teachers, modernizing curriculums, and violence in Chicago.” Kanye West/Twitter Kanye West/Twitter The Trump administration also did not invite West to perform at Trump’s inauguration, citing their goal to provide “typically and traditionally American” entertainment. 
West's wife, Kim Kardashian , has in recent weeks tweeted against Trump's travel restrictions for seven Muslim-majority countries. — Kim Kardashian West (@KimKardashian) January 29, 2017 But according to TMZ, West's decision to abandon public Trump support was his alone.
